db:select.doc:name: Select Accounts
db:select.db:sql: SELECT DISTINCT a.* FROM accounts a LEFT JOIN account_owners ao ON a.id = ao.account_id WHERE (:customerId::uuid IS NULL OR ao.customer_id = :customerId::uuid) AND (:accountNumber IS NULL OR a.account_number = :accountNumber) AND (:accountType IS NULL OR a.account_type = :accountType) AND (:status IS NULL OR a.status = :status) ORDER BY a.created_at DESC LIMIT :limit::integer OFFSET :offset::integer

ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output application/java --- if (payload is Array) payload else [payload] default []

db:select.doc:name: Select Account Owners
db:select.db:sql: SELECT account_id, customer_id, relationship_type FROM account_owners WHERE account_id = ANY(:accountIds::uuid[])

db:insert.db:sql: INSERT INTO account_owners ( account_id, customer_id, relationship_type ) VALUES ( :account_id::uuid, :customer_id::uuid, :relationship_type ) ON CONFLICT (account_id, customer_id) DO UPDATE SET relationship_type = EXCLUDED.relationship_type RETURNING *

db:select.db:sql: SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE account_id = :accountId::uuid AND (:startDate::date IS NULL OR transaction_date >= :startDate::date) AND (:endDate::date IS NULL OR transaction_date <= :endDate::date) AND (:transactionType IS NULL OR transaction_type = :transactionType) AND (:status IS NULL OR status = :status) ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT :limit::integer OFFSET :offset::integer
